```{r}
#| echo: false
#| include: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)
library(glue)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| include: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

ds<-read_csv("IKEA_SA_Furniture_Web_Scrapings_sss.csv")

tableds<-ds %>%
  filter(category=="Tables & desks") %>%
  select(-category,-...1,-old_price) %>%
  mutate(price_usd=round(price*0.266,2)) %>% # Conversion rate from SR to USD 4/24/2020
  arrange(desc(price)) %>%
  select(-price) %>%
  relocate(
    price_usd, .before = sellable_online 
  ) %>%
  head(10)
  
tableds
```

```{r}
#names(tableds)

tableds %>%
  gt() %>%
  tab_header(
    title = "IKEA Tables and Desks Saudi Arabia",
    subtitle = "Top 10 Most Expensive Tables as of 4/20/2020"
  ) %>%
  fmt_currency(
    columns = price_usd,
    currency = "USD"
  ) %>%
  cols_label(item_id="ID",
             name="Name",
             sellable_online="Sellable Online",
             link="Link",
             other_colors="Other Colors",
             short_description="Description",
             designer="Designer",
             depth="Depth",
             height="Height",
             width="Width") %>%
  tab_spanner(
    label="Dimensions",
    columns = c(depth,
                height,
                width)
  ) %>%
  gt_theme_dot_matrix()
```
